title: I feel like a huge reason behind ADHD denialism is that people want to believe nonworkers are just lazy and bad people
body: people dont face the reality that due to a neurodivergence a person cant work they want to believe it is a choice or that it isnt a barrier to work they want to force everyone to work and adhd especially treatmentresistant adhd is a threat to the social order people dont care about mental health if it disrupts their obsession with forcing everyone to work  capitalism and ableism are interlocked oppressions
